Ransomware is a type of malicious software that restricts access to your computer or your files and displays a message demanding that payment be made for you to regain access.

Do not pay the ransom! This threat is meant to scare and intimidate you. Even if you submit payment, there is no guarantee that you will regain access to your system or files.

Learn more about protecting yourself from ransomware: http://www.getcybersafe.gc.ca/cnt/rsks/cmmn-thrts-en.aspx#s05b
caption_cleaned: Ransomware is a type of malicious software that restricts access to your computer or your files and displays a message demanding that payment be made for you to regain access. Do not pay the ransom! This threat is meant to scare and intimidate you. Even if you submit payment, there is no guarantee that you will regain access to your system or files. Learn more about protecting yourself from ransomware:

Getting your gutters cleaned in the fall is a good idea, but not if you pay under the table.

If you pay cash or don’t get a receipt, you may be helping someone cheat on their taxes. You are also putting yourself at risk, particularly if your gutters get damaged or the job isn’t done right.
